item.title: Patagonia: Yvon Chouinard

item.description: In 1973, Yvon Chouinard started Patagonia to make climbing gear he couldnâ€™t find elsewhere. Over decades of growth, he has implemented a unique philosophy about business, leadership and profit. #Podcasts
